articles.author: Victoria Craw
articles.title: Scientists use DNA from three people to protect babies from rare disease - Yahoo
articles.description: A cohort of eight babies at risk of inheriting mitochondrial disease were born without complications after British scientists used a pioneering IVF technique.
articles.content: LONDON A pioneering IVF technique combining DNA from three people to protect a baby from a rare genetic disease has been used in Britain, leading to a healthy cohort of eight babies with no sign of s… [+5915 chars]

articles.title: Everything we learned from a week with Apple CarPlay Ultra - Ars Technica
articles.description: CarPlay Ultra takes over the main instrument display as well as the infotainment.

articles.title: Donkey Kong Bananza Surprisingly Uses AMD FSR 1, Ignoring One of the Nintendo Switch 2’s Key Features - Wccftech
articles.description: Despite the Nintendo Switch 2 supporting NVIDIA DLSS, Donkey Kong Bananza doesn't take advantage of it and uses AMD FSR 1 instead.
articles.content:
Donkey Kong Bananza ignores one of the Nintendo Switch 2's key features, instead using an outdated version of AMD FSR.
